function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of control over room temperature and humidity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate mental health support in built environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of natural light can impact mental health during lockdowns","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of indoor temperature and humidity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proper disposal of used disinfectants to avoid possible contact with humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification and cleaning of high-touch surfaces and occupied spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection of materials with antimicrobial properties","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to infected surfaces due to high-traffic areas and shared spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of new smart/innovative technologies for virus propagation prevention","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of fully pandemic-resilient indicators in green building certification systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited response to waste and wastewater management in assessment systems","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited focus on economic sustainability in green building certification systems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate readiness for pandemic and post-pandemic realities in risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of readiness for pandemic waste management wm1, wm2, wm3 in breeam, leed, casbee, and well standards.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Minimal responsiveness to environmental resources indicators in well standard.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reviewed green building certification systems not ready for pandemic-tailored wastewater management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of recommendation for touchless technologies to prevent virus spread","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Importance of
